In this session, we will give an introduction to data visualisation using [ggplot2](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) via a live coding demonstration. 

You can view my prep script [here](https://github.com/langtonhugh/rum_umc/blob/main/session_material/scripts/session_2.R), and the script used in the demonstration itself is available [here](https://github.com/langtonhugh/rum_umc/blob/main/session_material/scripts/session_2_demo.R).

Want to attend or present? [Get in touch](mailto:s.h.langton@amsterdamumc.nl)!
